channel.title: Léo Sumi’s random thoughts
channel.description: Hi, Léo here. Welcome to my small piece of internet. I wrote to put words on thoughts I have. I display them here for everyone to see. Look around: you may find some posts of interest to you.

item.title: Going static - Hello World! chronicle
item.description: The aim of this chronicle is to record the history of this site. How long will this post be? I do not know yet. Time will tell.

item.title: How to learn C
item.description: An article about the C programming language
